text: Robert Max Blum (November 24, 1928 â€“ November 27, 2022) was a fencer from USA. Blum competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 November 1928 and died on 27 November 2022.Robert Blum == References == Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American sabre fencers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
